title: One of my smurf accounts was banned soley on people lying and false reporting
body:
This isn't a wah my account got banned I want it reinstated thread..

One o my bronze smurfs was just banned for me shotcalling. Literally only calling out strategies.. At the end of my game my teammates told the enemy I was 'Extremely Toxic" and every person in the game filed a report on me based on that lie and whatever the problem was with my teammates that they decided to attack me.

The account was permanently banned right after that game

Keep in mind my teammates were calling me retard ashe and %%%%%% ashe all game.. but no penalty was issued or them. On top of literally Lying their asses off and filing a false report.. and BTW status update.. I have a troll account where I have done absolutely nothing but int feed for over 50 games now

It hasn't been banned.. 

RIOT you SINCERELY NEED TO FIX YOUR REPORT SYSTEM  because people are abusing it.. and the only people that seem to get punished are people who are overly passionate about the game.

If you have any questions about this please do not hesitate to contact us in the [Boards Moderation Discord server](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).
Post the logs, or no one is going to believe you or care.

> [{quoted}](name=Aurelion Soul NA,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=q50ZbIGf,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-01-27T21:35:51.310+0000)
>
> One o my bronze smurfs was just banned for me shotcalling.

No, it wasn't. It was banned for another reason. Chat logs would help, unless you were banned for something you said in the lobbies.

> At the end of my game my teammates told the enemy I was "Extremely Toxic" and every person in the game filed a report

Reports trigger the system to check your logs. It only takes one report. Any additional reports are useless. If the system doesn't find anything bad, then there is no effect on you. False reports are meaningless.

> but no penalty was issued or them. 

You won't necessarily get notified that someone else was punished. If multiple players report someone, only one player is notified.

> I have a troll account where I have done absolutely nothing but int feed for over 50 games now

It's a lot harder to detect that kind of behavior than it is to detect toxic chat. Riot does need to improve on that, this is true. But thanks for sharing. Hopefully, Riot will get faster at banning you.

It can't be true dude, chat logs are analyzed by a bot to check for certain words...
Even if everyone reported you, as long as you're not toxic in chat you won't get punished.
